syllabus:
教學目標  
使用天然與人工材料作為表面塗佈材料，先以手工操作先進材料進行操作與量測，以瞭解概念與程序，再快速短時間進行多樣機構設計，持續改善與永續提供合理且進階發展所需知識。  
教學進度與主題

固液態材料塗佈與複製原理

固液態材料塗佈與複製操作

固液態材料塗佈元件

固液態材料塗佈機構

固液態材料塗佈量測原理

固液態材料塗佈量測操作

固液態材料塗佈元件量測

固液態材料塗佈機構與應用方法

固液態材料塗佈量測與應用方法

作品測試與報告

學習歷程檔案與報告

Teaching Objectives  
Using natural and artificial materials as surface coating materials, first hand-operated advanced materials for operation and measurement to understand concepts and procedures, and then rapid and short-term design of various mechanisms, continuous improvement and sustainable provision of reasonable and advanced development. Knowledge is required.  
Teaching Progress and Topics

The principle of coating and replication of solid and liquid materials

Solid and liquid material coating and replication operations

Solid and liquid material coating components

Solid and liquid material coating mechanism

Principle of coating measurement of solid and liquid materials

Solid and liquid material coating measurement operation

Measurement of components coated with solid and liquid materials

Solid and liquid material coating mechanism and application method

Solid and liquid material coating measurement and application method

Work Tests and Reports

主題與商品配製印刷製程研究
